# isTouched

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is touching the button.

## Declaration

```swift
var isTouched: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the user is touching the button; otherwise, the user isn’t. For controllers that support capacitive touch, the user can start touching the button without pressure when the value property is `0`. For controllers that don’t support capacitive touch, the user starts touching the button when the value property is greater than `0`.

## Accessing input values

- **isPressed**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user is pressing the button.
- **value**: The level of pressure the user is applying to the button.
